resources.string:
The main purpose of this application is to fetch device statistics, and overall health of the device.

 In the future I would like to implement...

 1. Temperature readings for the CPU and Battery to monitor, and warn users when their device is overheating.
 2. A community forum where users can discuss their findings.
 3. Provide a repository of links I find useful for tinkering with Android.

Hi There my name is Craig!

 I'm a fifth term BIT Student at RRC Polytech, and I have a passion for Android's Open-Source Project!

 I began my journey in early 2013 with the introduction of my first smartphone the Samsung Galaxy Ace II X.
Hi again!\n\nI\'m glad you\'ve taken the time to checkout my application, feel free to send feedback or suggestions! I appreciate your time and considerations :)
